content: Happy new year everyone! 2019 was a pretty interesting development year for BRL-CAD on many fronts, so I'm really looking forward to seeing what 2020 has in store for us. If you're reading this and would like to take on a project (either in a leadership or guided role), send me a message or start a thread to discuss.
